mapper.sql:
t_house_asset_transaction.id, t_house_asset_transaction.user_id AS userId, t_house_asset_transaction.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_asset_transaction.house_type AS houseType, t_house_asset_transaction.state, t_house_asset_transaction.note, t_house_asset_transaction.create_time AS createTime, t_house_asset_transaction.update_time AS updateTime, t_house_asset_transaction.hide AS hide,
t_house_asset_transaction.issue, t_house_asset_transaction.building, t_house_asset_transaction.unit , t_house_asset_transaction.start_floor AS startFloor, t_house_asset_transaction.end_floor AS endFloor, t_house_asset_transaction.direction
mapper.select: SELECT t_house_asset_transaction.* FROM t_house_asset_transaction WHERE t_house_asset_transaction.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_asset_transaction.id
